key_takeaways: Solution: Research category demand and trends using keyword data (Difficulty: intermediate)

Growth Tactic: Evaluate keyword difficulty before committing to SEO strategy (Channel: seo)
Strategy: Focus on one marketing channel for maximum leverage in early stage
Strategy: Geographic market expansion to unsaturated regions
